interactivity.requirements: You must be on at least Day  56  to unlock this Event. You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Different Worlds " from Maya Makinami
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Upon fulfilling all Requirements, this Event will occur automatically on the first weekday on or after Day 56.

progression.synopsis: Sensei sits in his office after school, wondering as to the purpose of being a guidance counselor and whether it's even necessary, seeing as how he rarely receives a visit that would require that knowledge anyway - his inner monologue is interrupted when Maya walks in, to his momentary shock. He voices this opinion, and Maya quickly tells him she's not here because she wants to be - she's come to warn him of something that he must be ready for, otherwise horrible things will happen. Before telling him what she's come to warn him about, Maya asks Sensei if he has enjoyed his time in Kumon-mi, and he answers that he has - reality glitches if he tries to say anything otherwise. After this exchange, Maya warns him that this unknown event is going to happen in relation to Ami , and that she'll destroy him without hesitation if he hurts Ami in any way. He says that's fine since he has no intention of ever hurting her, and Maya quickly excuses herself, but not before telling Sensei that not all is as it seems. Afterward, Sensei leaves to go about his evening.
trivia: When Maya asks if he has had any strange experiences, Sensei mentions the first and/or second secret event, if he has seen them. Maya doesn't appear to know what he's talking about.
Visual artefacts as a result of antialiasing cause a noticeable change in the background image quality during this Event. This will not cause a performance drop.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.3.
